description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science pursuing a degree in the Department of Nursing Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Undergraduate student, Junior, or Senior Status Only Oklahoma resident Nursing major Enrolled full-time Demonstrate financial need, based on scholarship and financial aid currently receiving Two faculty letters of recommendation

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Nursing   or SIS_Major is Nursing
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major_2 is Nursing   or SIS_Major is Nursing

criteria.description: SIS_Classification is Junior   or SIS_Classification is Senior
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Classification is Junior   or SIS_Classification is Senior

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
